structure.unit: Powers And Duties Of The Department Of Elementary And Secondary Education

law.catch_line: Notification Of Accreditation Of Institution To Applicant For Admission Upon Acceptance Required
law.text: Any college, university, community college, junior college and other school of higher education, whether public or private, shall, upon accepting any applicant for admission to such institution, notify said applicant in writing whether or not said institution has been accredited by a recognized regional or professional accrediting agency.
